CookieConsent.title: [DE] Privacy & Sovereignty
CookieConsent.message: [DE] We use strictly necessary cookies to ensure platform security and data sovereignty compliance. Usage analytics are optional.

Home.AboveTheFold: [DE] OmniGCloud is the first autonomous multi-cloud fabric that enforces data sovereignty at the infrastructure level, allowing enterprises to decouple logic from vendor-specific APIs.

steps.title: Intent Definition
steps.desc: Define your governance and sovereignty rules in a vendor-agnostic format.

steps.title: Fabric Arbitration
steps.desc: The AECP kernel continuously audits and corrects infrastructure drift.

steps.title: State Enforcement
steps.desc: Logic is pushed to the edge, ensuring compliance regardless of the underlying cloud.

DeepDive.title: [DE] Architectural Deep Dive
DeepDive.content: [DE] Our platform eliminates the complexity of multi-cloud management by abstracting provider APIs into a unified control plane. This ensures that your business logic remains portable and secure, preventing vendor lock-in and guaranteeing long-term operational resilience.

WhyItMatters.title: [DE] Why Sovereignty Matters
WhyItMatters.content: [DE] In an era of fragmenting regulations, data residency is no longer optional. OmniGCloud provides mathematical guarantees that your data stays where it needs to be.

TechnicalApproach.title: [DE] Technical Approach
TechnicalApproach.content: [DE] We utilize a lattice-based state synchronization engine that operates on a millisecond scale, providing real-time remediation of non-compliant infrastructure states.

items.q: How does OmniGCloud differ from Terraform?
items.a: Terraform is a deployment tool; OmniGCloud is an active state enforcement engine that corrects drift automatically.

items.q: Is it compatible with AWS and Azure?
items.a: Yes, we support all major hyperscalers including AWS, Azure, GCP, and on-premise OpenShift clusters.

LeadCapture.title: [DE] Ready to regain control?
LeadCapture.subtitle: [DE] Schedule a comprehensive architecture review with our sovereign cloud experts.

Engagement.subtitle: [DE] Security, compliance, and velocity in one platform.

Capabilities.title: [DE] Core Capabilities
Capabilities.subtitle: [DE] Explore the building blocks of our sovereign cloud platform.

WhitePaper.title: [DE] The Autonomous Sovereign Cloud Protocol
WhitePaper.description: [DE] A comprehensive framework for achieving mathematical certainty in data sovereignty across multi-cloud environments.
WhitePaper.downloadSubtitle: [DE] Get the full technical specification, including architecture diagrams, decision frameworks, and implementation guides.
